author: davidlange6
body:
On top of the recent PR from Mike, I have
- re-enabled the workflows for pre-mixing (though the ones that need pre-mixed input will continue to fail until that input is properly defined
- reorganized the customize functions so that they can be easily maintained. Mike is needed to check that I got all of the useful differences with respect to the standard ones - there were very few.
title: Premixing workflows/customize redefined for 74x
